column5: The event will include a session of implementing various techniques and related strength boosters, where students will achieve various pole moves according to their own proficiency

column5: In this event people can join along or watch how workshops go about in our group!
column6: We're not really doing anything else. To focus on the improv, we cover a wide selection of topics and themes. We're also a hub to find other people to collaborate on skits, improv and projects.
